sentences.sContent: He sat down, his shoulders convulsing with sobs.
sentences.sCn: 他坐下来，因抽泣肩膀剧烈抖动。

remMethod.val: con + vuls(拉) + e → 一再拉 → 使剧烈震动

words.tran: 抽搐的；惊厥的；震动的；起痉挛的

trans.tranCn: 震动, 震撼, 使抽筋
trans.tranOther: if your body or a part of it convulses, it moves violently and you are not able to control it
